home.title: APIne Framework
home.description: APIne is a simple to use modular MVC Framework ready for the IoT (Internet of Things). It intends to be a general purpose framework and API providing session management, authentication and database abstraction without including useless tools.
home.small_one: Use this example project as a way to quickly start any new project.
home.small_two: This example shows simple views and session management.
